com.anji.neat

Class NeatConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgapcustomised.Configuration
      • com.anji.neat.NeatConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HyperNEATConfiguration

    public class NeatConfiguration
extends Configuration
implements Configurable
    Extension of JGAP configuration with NEAT-specific features added.
    Author:
    Philip Tucker
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BIAS_VIA_INPUT_KEY
      properties key, if "true" then bias should be provided to the network via an input, with value set by fitness function (old way of doing it), if "false" then the neurons will use internal bias values (new way).
      static java.lang.String CHROM_COMPAT_COMMON_COEFF_KEY
      properties key, speciation chromosome compatibility common coefficient
      static java.lang.String CHROM_COMPAT_DISJOINT_COEFF_KEY
      properties key, speciation chromosome compatibility disjoint coefficient
      static java.lang.String CHROM_COMPAT_EXCESS_COEFF_KEY
      properties key, speciation chromosome compatibility excess coefficient
      protected CloneReproductionOperator cloneOper 
      static java.lang.String CROSSOVER_MUTATE_RATE_KEY
      properties key, the probability that an individual produced by the crossover operator will be a candidate for having mutations applied to it (independent of other mutation probabilities).
      static java.lang.String CROSSOVER_PROPORTION_KEY
      properties key, proportion of new population that is generated via crossover from two parents (as opposed to mutation of a single parent), [0, 1].
      protected NeatCrossoverReproductionOperator crossoverOper 
      static double DEFAULT_CROSSOVER_PROPORTION
      default crossover proportion
      protected static short DEFAULT_INITIAL_HIDDEN_SIZE 
      static int DEFAULT_POPUL_SIZE
      default population size
      static short DEFAULT_RESPONSE_SIZE 
      static short DEFAULT_STIMULUS_SIZE 
      static double DEFAULT_SURVIVAL_RATE
      default survival rate
      static java.lang.String ELITISM_MIN_SPECIE_SIZE_KEY
      properties key, minimum size a specie must be to produce an elite member
      static java.lang.String ELITISM_MIN_TO_SELECT_KEY
      properties key, minimum number of elite members to select from a species, default is the number of objectives defined by fitness function.
      static java.lang.String ELITISM_PROPORTION_KEY
      properties key, elitism proportion
      protected java.lang.String hiddenActivationType 
      protected java.lang.String[] hiddenActivationTypeRandomAllowed 
      protected double[] hiddenActivationTypeRandomDistribution 
      static java.lang.String ID_FACTORY_KEY
      properties key, file in which unique ID sequence number is stored
      static java.lang.String INITIAL_TOPOLOGY_ACTIVATION_INPUT_KEY
      properties key, activation function type of input neurons
      static java.lang.String INITIAL_TOPOLOGY_ACTIVATION_KEY
      properties key, activation function type of neurons
      static java.lang.String INITIAL_TOPOLOGY_ACTIVATION_OUTPUT_KEY
      properties key, activation function type of output neurons
      static java.lang.String INITIAL_TOPOLOGY_ACTIVATION_RANDOM_ALLOWED_KEY
      properties key, allowed activation function types if the INITIAL_TOPOLOGY_ACTIVATION_KEY is "random".
      static java.lang.String INITIAL_TOPOLOGY_ACTIVATION_RANDOM_PROBABILITIES_KEY
      properties key, allowed activation function types if the INITIAL_TOPOLOGY_ACTIVATION_KEY is "random".
      static java.lang.String INITIAL_TOPOLOGY_FULLY_CONNECTED_KEY
      properties key, enable fully connected initial topologies
      static java.lang.String INITIAL_TOPOLOGY_NUM_HIDDEN_NEURONS_KEY
      properties key, number of hidden neurons in initial topology
      protected java.lang.String inputActivationType 
      static java.lang.String MAX_STAGNANT_GENERATIONS_KEY 
      static java.lang.String MAX_STAGNANT_MAINTAIN_FITTEST_GENERATIONS_KEY 
      protected double maxConnectionWeight 
      protected double minConnectionWeight 
      static java.lang.String MINIMUM_AGE_KEY 
      protected java.lang.String outputActivationType 
      protected static java.lang.String PERSIST_ENABLE_KEY 
      static java.lang.String POPUL_SIZE_KEY
      properties key, population size
      static java.lang.String RESPONSE_SIZE_KEY
      properties key, dimension of neural net response
      static java.lang.String SELECTOR_CLASS_KEY
      properties key, the NaturalSelector to use to perform the selection process.
      static java.lang.String SPECIATED_FITNESS_KEY 
      static java.lang.String SPECIATION_TARGET_KEY
      properties key, target number of species, default is popul.size / 15.
      static java.lang.String SPECIATION_THRESHOLD_CHANGE_KEY
      Deprecated. 
      Adjustment amounts are now calculated as a ratio of the target and current species counts. Properties key, amount to change speciation threshold to maintain speciation target
      static java.lang.String SPECIATION_THRESHOLD_KEY
      properties key, speciation threshold
      static java.lang.String STIMULUS_SIZE_KEY
      properties key, dimension of neural net stimulus
      static java.lang.String SURVIVAL_RATE_KEY
      properties key, survival rate
      static java.lang.String TOPOLOGY_MUTATION_CLASSIC_KEY
      properties key, topology mutation type; if true, use "classic" method where at most a single topological mutation occurs per generation per individual
      static java.lang.String WEIGHT_MAX_KEY
      properties key, maximum connection weight
      static java.lang.String WEIGHT_MIN_KEY
      properties key, minimum connection weight
      static java.lang.String WEIGHTED_SELECTOR_KEY
      properties key, enable weighted selection process.

      boolean biasViaInput()
      Returns true if bias should be provided to the network via an input with value set by fitness function (old way of doing it), or false then the neurons will use internal bias values (new way).

      ConnectionAllele newConnectionAllele(java.lang.Long srcNeuronId, java.lang.Long destNeuronId)
      factory method to construct new connection allele from neuron srcNeuronId to neuron destNeuronId according to NEAT add connection mutation; if a previous mutation has occurred adding a connection between srcNeuronId and destNeuronId, returns connection with that id; otherwise, new innovation id
      ConnectionAllele newConnectionAllele(java.lang.Long srcNeuronId, java.lang.Long destNeuronId, double weight)
      factory method to construct new connection allele from neuron srcNeuronId to neuron destNeuronId according to NEAT add connection mutation; if a previous mutation has occurred adding a connection between srcNeuronId and destNeuronId, returns connection with that id; otherwise, new innovation id

      Factory method to construct new neuron allele which has replaced connection connectionId according to NEAT add neuron mutation.

      factory method to construct new neuron allele with unique innovation ID of specified type
      void store()
      Store to persistence.

      • BIAS_VIA_INPUT_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String BIAS_VIA_INPUT_KEY
        properties key, if "true" then bias should be provided to the network via an input, with value set by fitness function (old way of doing it), if "false" then the neurons will use internal bias values (new way). Default is "true".
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public NeuronAllele newNeuronAllele(NeuronType type)
        factory method to construct new neuron allele with unique innovation ID of specified type
        Parameters:
        type -
        Returns:
        NeuronAllele

      • newNeuronAllele

        public NeuronAllele newNeuronAllele(java.lang.Long connectionId)
        Factory method to construct new neuron allele which has replaced connection connectionId according to NEAT add neuron mutation. If a previous mutation has occurred adding a neuron on connection connectionId, returns a neuron with that id - otherwise, a new id.
        Parameters:
        connectionId -
        Returns:
        NeuronAllele

      • newConnectionAllele

        public ConnectionAllele newConnectionAllele(java.lang.Long srcNeuronId,
                                   java.lang.Long destNeuronId)
        factory method to construct new connection allele from neuron srcNeuronId to neuron destNeuronId according to NEAT add connection mutation; if a previous mutation has occurred adding a connection between srcNeuronId and destNeuronId, returns connection with that id; otherwise, new innovation id
        Parameters:
        srcNeuronId -
        destNeuronId -
        Returns:
        ConnectionAllele

      • newConnectionAllele

        public ConnectionAllele newConnectionAllele(java.lang.Long srcNeuronId,
                                   java.lang.Long destNeuronId,
                                   double weight)
        factory method to construct new connection allele from neuron srcNeuronId to neuron destNeuronId according to NEAT add connection mutation; if a previous mutation has occurred adding a connection between srcNeuronId and destNeuronId, returns connection with that id; otherwise, new innovation id
        Parameters:
        srcNeuronId -
        destNeuronId -
        weight -
        Returns:
        ConnectionAllele

      • getCloneOperator

        public CloneReproductionOperator getCloneOperator()
        Returns:
        clone reproduction operator used to create mutated asexual offspring

      • getCrossoverOperator

        public NeatCrossoverReproductionOperator getCrossoverOperator()
        Returns:
        crossover reproduction operator used to create mutated sexual offspring

        minimum conneciton weight

      • biasViaInput

        public boolean biasViaInput()
        Returns true if bias should be provided to the network via an input with value set by fitness function (old way of doing it), or false then the neurons will use internal bias values (new way).
        See Also:
        BIAS_VIA_INPUT_KEY
